mapper.select: SELECT board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, board_user as boardUser, board_date as boardDate FROM board WHERE board_no= #{boardNo}
SELECT board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_user as boardUser, board_date as boardDate FROM board ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT #{currentPage}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_pw, board_title, board_content, board_user, board_date ) VALUES( #{boardPw}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardUser}, now() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE board_no= #{boardNo} AND board_pw= #{boardPw}
